tooltip.enderthing.ender_key_chest.right: Craft an Ender Lock and Shift-rightclick on a vanilla chest.
tooltip.enderthing.ender_key.right_click: Shift-Rightclick on a vanilla ender chest to open the shared inventory.
tooltip.enderthing.ender_lock.right_clic: Shift-Rightclick on a ender chest to set or replace the key.
tooltip.enderthing.ender_pack.right_clic: Rightclick to open the shared inventory.
tooltip.enderthing.ender_card.right_clic: Shift-Rightclick on air to bind it to you.
Shift-Rightclick on a private chest to bind the chest and allow automation.
text.enderthing.ender_card.bound: The card is now bound to you
text.enderthing.ender_chest.bound1: The chest is now bound to: %s
text.enderthing.ender_chest.bound2: The chest is now bound to: %s (%s)
text.enderthing.key_change: The key has been successfully changed to %s
